item.title: Shape of you
item.description: Here is the tutorial 《Shape Of You》全网最细2.0整首英文歌教唱 Here is a MV 【MV】黄老板新单-《Shape Of You》中英字幕 [Verse 1] A club isn’t the best place to find a lover So the bar is where I go (Mm) Me and my friends at the table doin’ shots Drinkin’ fast and then we talk slow (Mm) And you come over and start up a conversation with just me And trust me, I’ll give it a chance now (Mm)
